sourcesContent:
const work_data = [
  {
    name: "Smart Contact",
    shortDescription: "Spring Boot application which authenticates user and provides dashboard for users contact along with various CRUD operations.",
    description:
      "Spring Boot application which manages user authentication with spring security, perform CRUD operations related to users contact details and display the user's contact on dashboard.",
    techStack:"Spring Boot Thymeleaf MongoDB Java Javascript JQuery HTML CSS",
    role: "Developer",
    responsiblity:
      "Developing the entire application including both frontend and Backend, configuring the database, managing controllers, services and DAO",
    url: "https://github.com/Arnav-Tiwari/SmartContactManager/tree/master",
  },
  {
    name: "BLOGS",
    shortDescription: "React application that displays the blogs created by the user in reverse chronological order.",
    description: "-React application that displays the blogs created by the user in reverse chronological order.User can perform operation related to creating editing and deleting a blog.",
    techStack:"React,JavaScript,HTML,CSS.",
    role: "Developer",
    responsiblity:
      "Developing the frontend part of the application, creating components by means of function and custom hooks",
    url: "https://github.com/Arnav-Tiwari/Blogs",
  },
  {
    name: "Jump Game",
    shortDescription: "A two-dimensional graphic game that manoeuvres the character's control movement.",
    description:"A two-dimensional graphic game in which the player can manoeuvre the character's movements, such as jumping or climbing, to fulfil the game's objective.Focus on the fundamentals of OOPs as well as the involvement of data structures to achieve said objective.",
    techStack:"- JavaScript,OOPs,HTML,CSS",
    role: "Web Development",
    responsiblity:
      "Development of the entire application making use of only javascript, data structures and OOPS.",
    url: "https://github.com/Arnav-Tiwari/Jump-Game",
  },
  {
    name: "Awards Rebuild I",
    shortDescription: "React application, which exhibits the functionality of animated components inspired by Awwwards.",
    description: "-React application, which exhibits the functionality of animated components inspired by Awwwards. The application replicates the original site of MelRiver, trying to incorporate various transitions and overlay animations.",
    techStack:"React,JavaScript,HTML,CSS,SASS",
    role: "Web Development",
    responsiblity:
      "Developing the frontend part of the application, creating components by means of functions and custom hooks, as well as animation using GSAP.",
    url: "somehttp",
  },
  {
    name: "Awards Rebuild II ",
    shortDescription: "-React application, which exhibits the functionality of animated components inspired by Awwwards.",
    description: "-React application, which exhibits the functionality of animated components inspired by Awwwards. The application replicates the advanced animated hamburger menu of Awwwards website, including transition and scrolling animations.",
    techStack:"React,JavaScript,HTML,CSS,SASS",
    role: "Web Development",
    responsiblity:
      "Developing the frontend part of the application, creating components by means of functions and custom hooks, as well as animation using GSAP.",
    url: "somehttp",
  },
  {
    name: "TODOS",
    shortDescription: "Checklist app that records various tasks scheduled.",
    description: "-Checklist app that records various tasks scheduled, providing the functionality to strike out or remove the item from the checklist when done. Make use of React Context and various hooks to implement the functionality.",
    techStack:"React,JavaScript,HTML,CSS,SASS",
    role: "Web Development",
    responsiblity:
      "Developing the frontend part of the application, creating components by means of functions and custom hooks, and tackling the issue of state lifting using Context",
    url: "https://github.com/Arnav-Tiwari/Todo-App",
  },
];
export default work_data;
